CustomField.description: Auto populates based on the Mailing State
CustomField.formula:
CASE(
UPPER(BLANKVALUE(MailingState,Account.BillingState)),
'ALABAMA','Central Time (CST)','AL','Central Time (CST)', 'ARKANSAS','Central Time (CST)','AR','Central Time (CST)', 'ILLINOIS','Central Time (CST)','IL','Central Time (CST)', 'IOWA','Central Time (CST)','IA','Central Time (CST)', 'KANSAS','Central Time (CST)','KS','Central Time (CST)', 'LOUISIANA','Central Time (CST)','LA','Central Time (CST)', 'MINNESOTA','Central Time (CST)','MN','Central Time (CST)', 'MISSISSIPPI','Central Time (CST)','MS','Central Time (CST)', 'MISSOURI','Central Time (CST)','MO','Central Time (CST)', 'NEBRASKA','Central Time (CST)','NE','Central Time (CST)', 'NORTH DAKOTA','Central Time (CST)','ND','Central Time (CST)', 'OKLAHOMA','Central Time (CST)','OK','Central Time (CST)', 'SOUTH DAKOTA','Central Time (CST)','SD','Central Time (CST)', 'TENNESSEE','Central Time (CST)','TN','Central Time (CST)', 'TEXAS','Central Time (CST)','TX','Central Time (CST)', 'WISCONSIN','Central Time (CST)','WI','Central Time (CST)', 'CONNECTICUT','Eastern Time (EST)','CT','Eastern Time (EST)', 'DELAWARE','Eastern Time (EST)','DE','Eastern Time (EST)', 'DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA','Eastern Time (EST)','DC','Eastern Time (EST)', 'FLORIDA','Eastern Time (EST)','FL','Eastern Time (EST)', 'GEORGIA','Eastern Time (EST)','GA','Eastern Time (EST)', 'INDIANA','Eastern Time (EST)','IN','Eastern Time (EST)', 'KENTUCKY','Eastern Time (EST)','KY','Eastern Time (EST)', 'MAINE','Eastern Time (EST)','ME','Eastern Time (EST)', 'MARYLAND','Eastern Time (EST)','MD','Eastern Time (EST)', 'MASSACHUSETTS','Eastern Time (EST)','MA','Eastern Time (EST)', 'MICHIGAN','Eastern Time (EST)','MI','Eastern Time (EST)', 'NEW HAMPSHIRE','Eastern Time (EST)','NH','Eastern Time (EST)', 'NEW JERSEY','Eastern Time (EST)','NJ','Eastern Time (EST)', 'NEW YORK','Eastern Time (EST)','NY','Eastern Time (EST)', 'NORTH CAROLINA','Eastern Time (EST)','NC','Eastern Time (EST)', 'OHIO','Eastern Time (EST)','OH','Eastern Time (EST)', 'PENNSYLVANIA','Eastern Time (EST)','PA','Eastern Time (EST)', 'RHODE ISLAND','Eastern Time (EST)','RI','Eastern Time (EST)', 'SOUTH CAROLINA','Eastern Time (EST)','SC','Eastern Time (EST)', 'VERMONT','Eastern Time (EST)','VT','Eastern Time (EST)', 'VIRGINIA','Eastern Time (EST)','VA','Eastern Time (EST)', 'WEST VIRGINIA','Eastern Time (EST)','WV','Eastern Time (EST)', 'ARIZONA','Mountain Time (MST)','AZ','Mountain Time (MST)', 'COLORADO','Mountain Time (MST)','CO','Mountain Time (MST)', 'IDAHO','Mountain Time (MST)','ID','Mountain Time (MST)', 'MONTANA','Mountain Time (MST)','MT','Mountain Time (MST)', 'NEW MEXICO','Mountain Time (MST)','NM','Mountain Time (MST)', 'UTAH','Mountain Time (MST)','UT','Mountain Time (MST)', 'WYOMING','Mountain Time (MST)','WY','Mountain Time (MST)', 'CALIFORNIA','Pacific Time (PST)','CA','Pacific Time (PST)', 'NEVADA','Pacific Time (PST)','NV','Pacific Time (PST)', 'OREGON','Pacific Time (PST)','OR','Pacific Time (PST)', 'WASHINGTON','Pacific Time (PST)','WA','Pacific Time (PST)', '','', 'Other TimeZone')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto populates based on the Mailing State
CustomField.label: Timezone
